Class IDF_LogSmooth

  • java.lang.Object
    • functions.IDF_LogSmooth
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFunctionIDF

    public class IDF_LogSmooth
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFunctionIDF
    Specific implementation of IFunctionIDF, calculating IDF as a smoothed logarithmical function of other terms' weights
    Author:
    Pdz
